name: AgingChart
functionalRequirements:
## Aging Chart

### Purpose
Visualize accounts receivable aging buckets.

### Features
- Bar chart by age buckets
- 0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 90+ days
- Amount totals
- Color coding by severity

dataRequirements.description: Expects aggregated invoice aging data passed via props, typically derived from Invoices entity

entities.name: Invoices
entities.description: Invoice data aggregated into aging buckets
entities.usageContext: Data is pre-aggregated by parent component into aging buckets (0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 90+ days)

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- data: Chart configuration object
- onDataClick: Optional click handler

### Chart
- ApexCharts line chart
- Smooth curves with markers
- Interactive tooltips

properties.name: data
properties.type: {series?: Array<{name: string, data: number[]}>, values?: number[], categories?: string[], xAxisLabel?: string, yAxisLabel?: string}
properties.description: Chart data configuration with series, categories, and axis labels

properties.name: onDataClick
properties.type: (event: {seriesIndex: number, dataPointIndex: number, value: number}) => void
properties.description: Callback function triggered when a data point is clicked

description: Chart showing accounts receivable aging buckets
